sen.e: He served Tomonao UEDA and at the time of the Siege of Matsuyama-jo Castle by Toshiie MAEDA and Kagekatsu UESUGI in 1590, he surrendered with Naoyasu YAMADA, the keeper of the castle, Iemoto KANEKO and the Wakabayashi clan.
